tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
An individual's true character and personality is best revealed in a time of crisis. I think when it comes to doctors, this couldn't be more true! With Dr. H.C. Bhatt, and the gentle, caring, ************* and yet simple personality that he is, he has helped us tide over many a crisis over the last 1.5 years, every time our daughter (now 2-year old) faced a health issue. 

Most recently, our daughter was diagnosed with viral respiratory infection, and was very unwell for almost a week, with high fever, extreme cough and congestion. We were extremely anxious and worried. This is the time when parents are so very vulnerable that they'll take just about any advice from a doctor for the sake of their child. It is in these moments that a doctor's patience, kindness and sincere and honest advice matters the most. Dr. Bhatt has really helped us tide over this crisis with his good guidance, correct and accurate medication, and most importantly, never even once giving us any sign of anxiety. We saw the result in less than a few days - our daughter is recovering and much better now! 

Thank you so much Dr. Bhatt for the wonderful doctor and the wonderful human being that you are, and for everything you've done for us! God Bless!

- Amit Xerxes, father of Anahita Bhatia
reply_text: I m over whelmed mr amit ,your daughter is so adorable ,I did my duty nothing else ,rest is "HIS" wish ,  stay blessed and take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My child was suffering from  fever and also had  pain in his eyes and ears ,we were bit worried as what has happened to our child but thanks to Dr HC Bhatt  for finding out at physical  examination only that  what is the real issue and that too without any test (as that would have been an added expense for us and would have taken more time in starting the right medicine)it was only possible because of his rich experience and knowledge.I am thankful to him for all his support as my experience was phenomenal.

tags: None
review:
Myself a parents of twins recently and searching for a family Doctor for my newborn. After my research I found Dr.Bhatt and before saying that you are an extraordinary doctor, I want to tell you that you are an extraordinary human being. Thanks for showing so much care and concern.He is a conscientious and caring healthcare provider. He listens and analyzes your symptom to provide the correct mode of care.At my first visit i realise that Dr is very pleasant, he took his time to explain diagnosis and made sure all my questions were answered before leaving his office.
Many of your patients have recommended you as a good doctor. But I am going one step further to also to recommend you as a great human being. Thanks for everything.
reply_text: Sorry for replying late,it's great to hear from you ,thx for your appreciation ,stay blessed n tc ,once again thx.

review:
We went for vaccinations of my newborn.Doc was to the point ,he decluttered the various doubt regarding type n price of vaccine,,We had  lots of info Regarding vaccines from friends ,google and other docs and were highly confused which to give n why .
The Doc easily explains u the pros n cons of a particular vaccine which gave us a lot of confidence and now 18 months with him ,We both easily can say he‚Äôs professionally competent and  we came to know that he has published so many news article on vaccine ,corona virus etc in various news papers.
We recommended him to our fellow lawyers they ended with same happy feed back .
reply_text:
I do remember you both young lawyers ,happy to know that u have penned down your feelings too ,u r coming to for regular vaccinations n other pediatric issues .Your appreciation means a lot .
Thx n stay blessed the whole family .
